price: Est-ce donc toi qui fait entendre les sourds ou qui guide les aveugles et ceux qui sont dans un égarement évident?
arabic: أَفَأَنتَ تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ أَوۡ تَهۡدِي ٱلۡعُمۡيَ وَمَن كَانَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: afa-anta tus'miʿu al-ṣuma aw tahdī al-ʿum'ya waman kāna fī ḍalālin mubīnin
